name: WF6 - Contract Signed → Invoice + Retainer + Full Onboarding

nodes.name: SignWell Webhook
nodes.notes: In SignWell: Settings → Webhooks → Add webhook URL. Subscribe to 'document.completed' event.

nodes.name: Verify SignWell Signature
nodes.notes: Replace YOUR_SIGNWELL_WEBHOOK_SECRET with the secret from SignWell → Settings → Webhooks.

parameters.formula: ={{ JSON.stringify({ property: 'Project Status', select: { equals: 'Contract Sent' } }) }}

nodes.name: Find Notion Project
nodes.notes: Finds the project record created by WF4. Replace YOUR_NOTION_PROJECTS_DB_ID.

nodes.name: Stripe Find Customer
nodes.notes: Finds the Stripe customer by email. HTTP Header Auth: Name=Authorization, Value=Bearer sk_live_YOUR_STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.

nodes.name: Stripe Send Invoice
nodes.notes: Sends the half-upfront invoice now that the contract is signed.

nodes.name: Find Paused Subscription
nodes.notes: Finds the paused retainer subscription created by WF4.

nodes.name: Resume Retainer Subscription
nodes.notes: Resumes the paused subscription so the monthly retainer starts billing.

parameters.url: =https://www.googleapis.com/drive/v3/files?q={{ encodeURIComponent("name contains '" + ($('Extract Invoice ID').first().json.company_name || $('Extract Invoice ID').first().json.contact_name) + "' and mimeType = 'application/vnd.google-apps.folder' and 'YOUR_CLIENTS_FOLDER_ID' in parents") }}&fields={{ encodeURIComponent('files(id, name)') }}

nodes.name: Create Slack Channel
nodes.notes: Creates a private Slack channel for the client project. HTTP Header Auth: Name=Authorization, Value=Bearer xoxb-YOUR_SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.

parameters.subject: =Welcome to Veteran Vectors — Let's Get Started
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('Match & Validate').first().json.contact_name.split(' ')[0] }},

Great news — your Statement of Work is fully signed and we're ready to roll.

Here's what happens next:

1. Your initial invoice has been sent via Stripe — you'll receive a separate email with payment details.

2. Your monthly retainer will begin billing at the start of next month.

3. Book your kickoff call here: https://calendly.com/YOUR_CALENDLY_LINK/kickoff

During the kickoff call, we'll walk through the project timeline, confirm priorities, and make sure we have everything needed to hit the ground running.

Your signed contract has been saved to your project folder for reference.

Looking forward to building this with you.

Anthony Pinto
Veteran Vectors LLC
anthony@veteranvectors.com

nodes.name: Send Welcome Email
nodes.notes: Replace YOUR_CALENDLY_LINK with your kickoff call Calendly link.

nodes.name: Create Thursday Calendar Reminder
nodes.notes: Creates a recurring Thursday check-in calendar event. Repeats for 26 weeks (~6 months).

nodes.name: Update Notion Project - Active
nodes.notes: Updates the Notion Project record to 'Active' so WF7 weekly check-ins can find it.

parameters.text:
=:white_check_mark: *{{ $('Match & Validate').first().json.company_name }} is fully onboarded!*

• Contract signed
• Invoice sent (half upfront)
• Retainer subscription activated
• Signed contract saved to Drive
• Private Slack channel created
• Welcome email sent
• Weekly Thursday check-in scheduled
• Project marked Active in Notion

_Kickoff call link sent to {{ $('Match & Validate').first().json.contact_name }}._
